Actions.Name: Get Weather Stations Nearby
Actions.Description: Returns a list of nearby stations, sorted by distance. Use paging to control the number of stations returned. Returns 5 stations by default. Sorted by distance from location ascending.

Actions.Name: Get Single Weather Station
Actions.Description: Get the metadata for a specific station

Actions.Name: Get Single Weather Station 15min Summary
Actions.Description: Returns a set of quarter-hourly summaries for a specific station. Note that the 30min summary is only available from the beginning of the previous year to the current date.

Actions.Name: Get Single Weather Station 30min Summary
Actions.Description: Returns a set of half-hourly summaries for a specific station. Note that the 15min summary is only available from the beginning of the previous year to the current date.

Actions.Name: Get Single Weather Station Bulletins
Actions.Description: Returns daily 9am bulletins for a station. The daily 9am bulletin is a summary where every field has been summarized over the 24 hour period to 9am.

Actions.Name: Get Single Weather Station Daily Summary
Actions.Description: Returns a set of daily summaries for a specific station. The 24 hour period each field is summarized over varies between 24 hours to 9am (eg rainfall, minimum temperature), 24 hours from 9am (eg maximum temperature) and 24 hours from 12am (eg wind, solar).

Actions.Name: Get Single Weather Station Hourly Summary
Actions.Description: Returns a set of hourly summaries for a specific station.

Actions.Name: Get Single Weather Station Latest Data
Actions.Description: Get the latest data for a station.

Actions.Name: Get Single Weather Station Minute Data
Actions.Description: Returns minute recordings for a station over a maximum 24 hour period.

Actions.Name: Get Single Weather Station Monthly Summary
Actions.Description: Returns a set of monthly summaries for a specific station. The monthly period each field is summarized over is a monthly composite of the same 24 hour period used by the field in the daily summary. For example, rainfall, which uses the 24 hours to 9am daily period starts at 9am on the last day of the previous month and concludes at 9am on the last day of the month.

Actions.Name: Get Weather Stations
Actions.Description: Returns a list of stations and their metadata.

Actions.Name: Get Weather Stations 15min Summary
Actions.Description: Returns a set of quarter-hourly summaries for a list of stations. Note that the 15min summary is only available from the beginning of the previous year to the current date.

Actions.Name: Get Weather Stations 15min Summary Timeseries
Actions.Description: Returns a set of quarter-hourly time-series summaries for a list of stations. Useful for charts. Note that the 15min summary is only available from the beginning of the previous year to the current date.

Actions.Name: Get Weather Stations 30min Summary
Actions.Description: Returns a set of half-hourly summaries for a list of stations. Note that the 30min summary is only available from the beginning of the previous year to the current date.

Actions.Name: Get Weather Stations 30min Summary Timeseries
Actions.Description: Returns a set of half-hourly time-series summaries for a list of stations. Useful for charts.

Actions.Name: Get Weather Stations Availability
Actions.Description: Gets the availability metadata for weather stations

Actions.Name: Get Weather Stations Bulletins
Actions.Description: Returns daily 9am bulletins for a list of stations. The daily 9am bulletin is a summary where every field has been summarized over the 24 hour period to 9am.

Actions.Name: Get Weather Stations Daily Summary
Actions.Description: Returns a set of daily summaries for a list of stations. The 24 hour period each field is summarized over varies between 24 hours to 9am (eg rainfall, minimum temperature), 24 hours from 9am (eg maximum temperature) and 24 hours from 12am (eg wind, solar)

Actions.Name: Get Weather Stations Daily Summary Timeseries
Actions.Description: Returns a set of daily time-series summaries for a list of stations. Useful for charts.

Actions.Name: Get Weather Stations Extreme Conditions
Actions.Description: Get the amount of time weather stations have had extreme conditions for, over various time periods. The extreme conditions indicated are: frost conditions - where temperature is less than or equal to 2°C; heat conditions - where temperature is greater than or equal to 30°C; and erosion conditions - where wind is greater than or equal to 28.8km/h.

Actions.Name: Get Weather Stations Extreme Events
Actions.Description: Find extreme values for weather stations.

Actions.Name: Get Weather Stations Hourly Summary
Actions.Description: Returns a set of hourly summaries for a list of stations.

Actions.Name: Get Weather Stations Hourly Summary Timeseries
Actions.Description: Returns a set of hourly time-series summaries for a list of stations. Useful for charts.

Actions.Name: Get Weather Stations Latest Data
Actions.Description: Get the latest data for a series of stations. Returns all active stations by default.

Actions.Name: Get Weather Stations Monthly Summary
Actions.Description: Returns a set of monthly summaries for a list of stations. The monthly period each field is summarized over is a monthly composite of the same 24 hour period used by the field in the daily summary. For example, rainfall, which uses the 24 hours to 9am daily period starts at 9am on the last day of the previous month and concludes at 9am on the last day of the month.

Actions.Name: Get Weather Stations Monthly Summary Timeseries
Actions.Description: Returns a set of monthly time-series summaries for a list of stations. Useful for charts.

Actions.Name: Get Weather Stations Yearly Summary
Actions.Description: Returns a set of annual summaries for a list of stations. The yearly period each field is summarized over is a yearly composite of the same 24 hour period used by the field in the daily summary. For example, rainfall, which uses the 24 hours to 9am daily period starts at 9am on the last day of the previous year and concludes at 9am on the last day of the year.

Actions.Name: Get Weather Stations Yearly Summary Timeseries
Actions.Description: Returns a set of yearly time-series summaries for a list of stations. Useful for charts.

Actions.Name: Get Single Weather Station Yearly Summary
Actions.Description: Returns a set of yearly summaries for a specific station. The yearly period each field is summarized over is a yearly composite of the same 24 hour period used by the field in the daily summary. For example, rainfall, which uses the 24 hours to 9am daily period starts at 9am on the last day of the previous year and concludes at 9am on the last day of the year.

Actions.Name: Get Single Weather Station Availability
Actions.Description: Get Single Weather Station Availability

Actions.Name: Get Single Weather Station Rainfall
Actions.Description: Get the rainfall weather station has received over various time periods up to the current time.

Actions.Name: Get Weather Stations Rainfall
Actions.Description: Get the rainfall weather stations have received over various time periods up to the current time.
